channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
Im using Whitescape source but its a bit like others
so i have a few questions
HOw do i make it so where it says weight carrying it says the Co:ords
Also how do i put attackable and non attackable npc's around
Also how can i add things like ::crystalchest and ::saveme and ::kingbd
And last i am admin how do i spawn items?
Thanks alot
Bielby <333
Add me on msn if you would like to add more help
jake4liverpool@hotmail.co.uk
thanks <3[br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 02:38:07 PM[/size][hr]help ;[
